pages.text: Beyond the Horizon mod pack includes tools that make building easier and faster than ever. $(br2)With Building Wands and Building Gadgets, you can construct large structures in no time!
Building Wands $(br2)Craft a Building Wand using sticks and a gem like emerald or diamond. $(br2)Use the wand to place multiple blocks at once, making walls, floors, and roofs a breeze.
Building Gadgets $(br2)Craft the Gadget Building or Gadget Exchanging tools to place or replace blocks efficiently. $(br2)Use the Destruction Gadget to clear out large areas quickly.
Combine these tools with the Copy-Paste Gadget for replicating complex structures, or use the Template Manager to store your designs. $(br2)Building has never been easier!
